# LLMs.txt for Exotic Perle Teckel website

site_name: Exotic Perle Teckel
site_url: https://www.teckelnain.com
language: fr-FR
purpose: Website for a dachshund (teckel) breeder. Provide info about breeding, puppies, contact, and legal notices.

key_pages:
- / (home)
- /presentation
- /nos-chiots
- /nos-reproducteurs
- /le-teckel
- /contact
- /bien-etre-animal
- /mentions-legales
- /conditions-generales
- /politique-de-confidentialite

- email: exoticperleteckel@gmail.com

legal:
- legal_name: ELEVAGE ROYAL
- trade_name: Exotic Perle Teckel
- siren: 917907016
- siret: 91790701600013

content_guidance:
- focus: accurate information about breeding, animal welfare, and adoption process
- avoid: inventing prices, availability, or medical claims not stated on the site
